Course_Name: [SoSe 2024] Masterseminar: Ethnic Segregation. Drivers, Effects and Planning Responses

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Next seminar on Thursday, Basic text

Messages.Author: Heike Hanhörster
Messages.Content: Dear students, I have uploaded an article that I would like you to read. It will be a helpful background information for the presentation of Galyna Sukhomud, who will join us next week and talk about the role of solidarity housing for refugees from Ukraine in Germany. See you on Thursday, Heike Hanhörster

Messages.Author: Heike Hanhörster
Messages.Content: I just got the information that we will start at 15.15! see you then, Heike

Messages.Author: Heike Hanhörster
Messages.Content: Dear students,  This is a gentle reminder of our upcoming meeting with students from the University of Vienna, tomorrow, Wednesday 25 June, 15:00 - 16:30.  We will meet in person in room 226 (B building) and use a meeting owl to connect digitally with Vienna.  Only for those of you who cannot make it in person: Here is the link https://univienna.zoom.us/j/62357678512?pwd=CbzrZt1BMVCCbm0hxYRtxMLKwBu5Sh.1 Meeting-ID: 623 5767 8512; Code: 656491 The day after, Thursday 27 June, we have our regular meeting with a presentation by Annika about Vienna.  Next week's meeting (4 July) is cancelled!  Best wishes and see you tomorrow Heike Hanhörster

Messages.Author: Mona Beyer
Messages.Content: Dear students, I'm looking forward to meeting you tomorrow in Rollberg. Just a quick note from me and schedule for tomorrow: We will meet at 12.00 h in front of Quartiersmanagement Rollberg (Falkstr. 25, 12053 Berlin) for the walk. Please note that the address system in the neighbourhood is very confusing. The easiest way to find the Quartiersmanagement is to enter the full name on Google Maps (searching for just the address will lead you to another entrance). The closest U-Bahn station is Boddinstraße (U8). At 13.00 h we will gather at Kiezanker e.V. (Falkstr. 24) for a Q&A with Alex (Quartiersmanagement) and guests from the neighbourhood. You can write down any questions in the Etherpad in advance so we can make sure that they will be addressed tomorrow. See you tomorrow!

Messages.Author: Heike Hanhörster
Messages.Content: Dear Students We will meet for our neighbourhood walk on Thursday at 12pm in front of the Quartiersmanagement Rollbergsiedlung, Falkstraße 25. To prepare for the walk, please read the basic text (one for English speaking participants, one for German speaking participants).  Please also have a look at the etherpad and write down one or two questions you have about the Rollberg estate. See you on Thursday! Heike Hanhörster

Messages.Author: Heike Hanhörster
Messages.Content: A gentle reminder: Tomorrow's seminar is cancelled. The next meeting will be held in the B building, second floor, room 226 (opposite the secretariat). Best wishes Heike Hanhörster

Messages.Author: Heike Hanhörster
Messages.Content: A gentle reminder: Our next seminar meeting will take place in the ISR building (Hardenbergstr. 40A), room 226. In addition to the student presentation on informal settlements and spatial appropriation in Lima/Peru, we will have a presentation by Dr Tamlyn Monson (Coventry University) on South Africa. Tamlyn will be joining us virtually to talk about 'Solidarity and exclusion at the margins of a residentially segregated city'. Best wishes and see you on Thursday, Heike Hanhörster
